amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of the National Neurological Conditions Surveillance System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3927 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3927 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5903-5904; text: CR S5903-5904) To provide for the establishment of the National Neurological Conditions Surveillance System.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3927 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3927 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
